description:
Sparks erupt, multiple balls of fire illuminate the emptiness of space, and amidst all that, there is "Tabletop Island".
Due to the plan Kuisu devised, Tenchi and Shou end up having to deal with the pirates.
Even though he was still not used to being in space, Tenchi works with Shou and the others to contain and ship off the pirates, despite having his doubts.
One day, "Miron Pham" and "Fuku" visit the Masaki family.
Miron explains that the plan is to anchor Tabletop Island on earth.
She further explains that with the "Paradise War" being concluded and the island having become a floating paradise, the conditions are finally met to invite the Masaki Family there.
This would be an ideal place to train Kenshi.
Both Tenchi and Washu are taken aback by Miron`s casual words.
With all sorts of thoughts on his mind, Tenchi accompanies Kenshi, Ryouko, Ayeka, and the others to Tabletop Island.
There, Tenchi will be doing some soul searching...
Source: crunchyroll
